participant_2.background:
I'm not sure how to tell my parents that I've been seeing a therapist, but I know it's something I need to do.
I went to the opera and got a new hair dye while on vacation.
My parents are not supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career.
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
my favorite singer is taylor swift.

content.text: Not much, just thinking about how to tell my parents I've been seeing a therapist.
Oh, that's tough. How long have you been seeing a therapist?
About a month now. I've been having a lot of trouble with anxiety and depression, and I think it's really helping.
I'm glad to hear that it's helping. I know it can be hard to open up to someone about that kind of stuff, but it's really important to take care of your mental health.
Thanks. I'm still not sure how to tell my parents, but I know I need to do it soon.
Maybe you could write them a letter? That way you can get your thoughts down on paper and you can control the way they react.
That's a good idea. I'll have to think about what I want to say.
Take your time. It's not something you have to do right away.
No problem. I'm here for you.
I'm really glad I have you as a friend.
